entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
